00018 #include "agg_render_buffer.h"
00019 #include "agg_scanline.h"
00020 #include "agg_render_bgr24_solid.h"
00021 
00022 namespace agg
00023 {
00024 
00025     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026     void render_bgr24_solid::render(scanline* sl)
00027     {
00028         if(!sl->reset_iterator(rbuf()->get_clip_box())) return;
00029 
00030         unsigned char* start = rbuf()->get_row(sl->get_y());
00031         register unsigned num_spans = sl->get_num_spans();
00032 
00033         while(num_spans--)
00034         {
00035             if(sl->next_span())
00036             {
00037                 register const unsigned char* covers = sl->get_covers();
00038                 register unsigned count = sl->get_count();
00039                 register unsigned char* pix_ptr = start + sl->get_x() * 3;
00040 
00041                 while(count--)
00042                 {
00043                     register int alpha = (*covers++) * m_a;
00044                     register int b = pix_ptr[0];
00045                     register int g = pix_ptr[1];
00046                     register int r = pix_ptr[2];
00047                     *pix_ptr++ = (((m_b - b) * alpha) + (b << 16)) >> 16;
00048                     *pix_ptr++ = (((m_g - g) * alpha) + (g << 16)) >> 16;
00049                     *pix_ptr++ = (((m_r - r) * alpha) + (r << 16)) >> 16;
00050                 }
00051             }
00052         }
00053     }
00054 
00055 
00056 
00057 }
